page.title: 09Trade
page.content: Seamer village has 4 shops,a fish & chip shop,a small general store which employs 5 people,a supermarket called "Proudfoots", & a campsite shop.Proud- foots was established approx.40 years ago.It has a workforce of 13 & opens between 8.30am & 6.30pm 6 days a week & 8.30am & 1.00pm on Sundays.The fish & chip shop is open most days &, like Proudfoots, & the general store,is on the main street.The campsite shop is a small family run shop which sells dairy products,beach accessories, sweets & cigarettes.It has only been open a year & its hours are 8.30am_ 8.00pm.Irton has only 1 very small general store on the main street which sells a variety of general products.
